text: I'm looking for a way to pull in the link to a product from the deal's line items in an email.  When someone makes a purchase, I want to send them a "review your product" email.  Since they might buy multiple products, our website has different reviews for every product right on the page.  The problem is directing people to those pages based on what they ordered.  I tried to pull in the data, but anytime I use line_item.url, I get no value.
